textBeforeTable: td.orangeproc { border: none; padding: .25em; background:#ffaf0a; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; } td.greenproc { border: none; padding: .25em; background:#c6ce0b; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; } th.labelproc { border: none; padding: .25em; vertical-align: top; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; } td.labelproc { border: none; padding: .25em; vertical-align: top; text-align: left; } table.proc { border-collapse: separate; border: none; } td.orange { border: 1px solid #5A97D0; padding: .25em; background:#ffaf0a; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; } td.green { border: 1px solid #5A97D0; padding: .25em; background:#c6ce0b; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; } td.label { border: 1px solid #5A97D0; padding: .25em; vertical-align: top; text-align: left; } td { border: 1px solid #5A97D0; padding: .25em; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; } th { border: 1px solid #5A97D0; padding: .25em; vertical-align: center; font-weight: bold; } table { border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #5A97D0; }
textAfterTable: Rush Delivery                     Express Delivery                         = Processing Time      = Shipping Time Processing Time For Standard and Rush Orders: Orders placed prior to 12 pm (noon) ET, Mon - Fri, are processed within 1 - 2 business days upon credit card validation. (Occasionally, during large promotional events, there may be an additional delay as noted on our shipping page in checkout.) For Next Business Day Orders: Orders placed prior to 12 pm (noon) ET, Mon - Fri, are processed the same day upon credit card validation, and delivered via UPS the following business day before 3:00 p.m. Orders placed after 12 pm (noon) ET on Fri will ship out on Mon, pending credit card validation (unless Mon is a Holiday). Free Shipping Orders shipping with Free Shipping are usually sent via UPS Basic or UPS Surepost and may take up to 10 business days to arrive at the destination. Total time to the destination also includes processing, which may take 1-2 business days. Business days are Monday through
